content: learn how to crochet a corner to corner moss stitch rectangular blanket complete with its very own moss stitch border for my blanket i used 2 and a half cinnamon swirl cakes in the colourway tropical breeze with a 6mm hook for the border i used 2 balls of paintbox chunky in white with a 7mm hook my blanket measures approximately 90cm x 106cm 35 by 41 you can use any yarn you so wish please note - you will need a hook size at least one size larger than the yarn recommends and a hook two sizes larger for the border
